## Overview

The Asia/Pacific session featured 13 presentations covering a wide range of topics from open-source culture and data strategy to AI implementation and clinical reporting automation. These presentations showcase the growing adoption of R and innovative applications across pharmaceutical companies in the region.

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## Automation & Efficiency

### Leverage Template-Based Automated Reporting on DMC Materials

**Nina Han, Peng Zhang**

-   Consistency across reports
-   Error reduction
-   Reproducibility

------------------------------------------------------------------------

### Dynamic Creation of Kaplan-Meier Plots and Summary Tables

**Takumi Imamura, Takahiro Hasegawa**

R Shiny application for interactive survival data visualization and table generation.

**Features:**

-   Interactive K-M plots
-   Dynamic summary measures
-   User-friendly interface
-   Export capabilities

------------------------------------------------------------------------

### autoslideR: Streamlining Slide Deck Generation

**Yolanda Zhou, Joe Zhu** (Roche)

R package for automating clinical reporting slide decks (also presented in EU/US sessions).

**Key advantages:**

-   0.5-4 days time savings
-   Multiple event types supported
-   Customizable layouts
-   Placeholder functionality

**Resources:** [pharmaverse.github.io/examples/digit_files/autoslider.html](https://pharmaverse.github.io/examples/digit_files/autoslider.html)
